attributes.action: Reconsider the TOTAL ban on smoking in public places and replace it with a PARTIAL ban in CLUBS & PUBS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: enabling addicts like myself to continue our way of life in our own designated smoking rooms.Along with millions of other people of a similar age, I have been smoking LEGALLY for over 40 years,thus ploughing millions of pounds into public coffers.I believe our HUMAN RIGHTS have been usurped.We all understand the dangers of smoking, but it should be OUR choice and we should be allowed to continue this LAWFUL habit in our own designated areas, thereby not impinging on the rights of non-smokers. We should not be ostracized by non-smokers, almost to the extent of being criminalized.Many Pubs & clubs will close, costing jobs, causing untold misery for thousands of people.I urge you to reappraise your decision.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
